Gisborne Thistle-United rivalry hardened referee Niven https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/01/gisborne-thistle-united-rivalry-hardened-referee-niven/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/01/gisborne-thistle-united-rivalry-hardened-referee-niven/ John Gillies'I’m a grizzled veteran of football in this town.'Sun, 30 Jun 2024 23:45:59 +0000 Gisborne referee Chris Niven keeps up with the play as Gisborne Thistle player Matt McVey heads upfield with a Western United player giving chase.
